price: 46. pour appeler à Allah avec Sa permission, et pour (éclairer) en flambeau lumineux.
arabic: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wadāʿiyan ilā al-lahi bi-idh'nihi wasirājan munīran
